Paper.Title: Preliminary Lexical Framework for English-Arabic Semantic Resource Construction

Section.Paragraph: This paper describes preliminary work concerning the creation of a Framework to aid in lexical semantic resource construction. The Framework consists of 9 stages during which various lexical resources are collected, studied, and combined into a single combinatory lexical resource.
